verses:
A psalm for David.  Lord, who shall dwell in thy tabernacle?  or
who shall rest in thy holy hill?
He that walketh without blemish, and worketh justice:

He that speaketh truth in his heart, who hath not used deceit in
his tongue:  Nor hath done evil to his neighbour:  nor taken up a
reproach against his neighbours.

He that hath not put out his money to usury, nortaken bribes
against the innocent:  He that doth these things, shall not be moved for
ever.
